description.narrative: Field Operations - Earthquake Response, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Unicef Capacity For Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By Dec 2017, early recovery and reconstruction efforts will enhance the national and local capacities to a quicker transition in achieving more sustainable outcomes for children and women in the 14 highly affected Earthquake districts with a focus on building resilience, strengthening systems, capacity building and increasing local and national ownership.

title.narrative: Nepal United Nations Development Assistance Framework

UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Nepal 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Exit strategy successfully implemented with timely completion of the implementation of key programme components rolling workplan for earthquake recovery and reconstruction work in 14 severely affected districts and timely handover of asset to relevant partners. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: Percentage of staff who have completed their mandatory trainings and are well versant with UNICEF policy and procedure related to travel.
Number of fully functional emergency sites (staffing as per plan and MOSS compliance)
Operation process and procedures in place including those related to establishment of petty cash.

actual.value: 2015:On-track. Petty cash custodian in place in all locations
